video.transcript:
Performance planning and measurement are essential in a performance-driven culture. You need to know where you and your life insurance professionals stand currently and where you are going.

In this module, you saw the benefits of performance planning and measurement along with the responsibilities that you and your team members have to fulfil.

You have also seen that performance planning and measurement are ongoing throughout the year. You also learned how one-to-one planning meetings are run and what happens afterwards to measure performance and keep targets on track.

Performance planning and measurement is all about setting targets, creating a plan, tracking actual performance and providing support where required. Do this with each of your life insurance professionals, and you will enable them to achieve their targets. In doing so, make sure that you achieve your own personal goals.
